00023 #ifndef _CTK_SPU_EVENT_H
00024 #define _CTK_SPU_EVENT_H
00025 
00030 #ifdef __cplusplus
00031 extern "C" {
00032 #endif
00033 
00034 #ifndef MFC_DMA_QUEUE_AVAILABLE_EVENT
00035 /* Events for Channels 0-2 */
00036 # define MFC_DMA_TAG_STATUS_UPDATE_EVENT     0x00000001
00037 # define MFC_DMA_TAG_CMD_STALL_NOTIFY_EVENT  0x00000002
00038 # define MFC_DMA_QUEUE_AVAILABLE_EVENT       0x00000008
00039 # define MFC_SPU_MAILBOX_WRITTEN_EVENT       0x00000010
00040 # define MFC_DECREMENTER_EVENT               0x00000020
00041 # define MFC_PU_INT_MAILBOX_AVAILABLE_EVENT  0x00000040
00042 # define MFC_PU_MAILBOX_AVAILABLE_EVENT      0x00000080
00043 # define MFC_SIGNAL_2_EVENT                  0x00000100
00044 # define MFC_SIGNAL_1_EVENT                  0x00000200
00045 # define MFC_LLR_LOST_EVENT                  0x00000400
00046 # define MFC_PRIV_ATTN_EVENT                 0x00000800
00047 # define MFC_MULTI_SRC_EVENT                 0x00001000
00048 #endif
00049 
00050 /* the define has changed from Cell SDK 1.1 -> 2.0 */
00051 #ifdef SPU_RdEventStatMask
00052 # define SPU_RdEventMask     SPU_RdEventStatMask
00053 #endif
00054 
00059 static inline int ctk_event_count()
00060 {
00061     return spu_readchcnt(SPU_RdEventStat);
00062 }
00063 
00068 static inline int ctk_event_read()
00069 {
00070     return spu_readch(SPU_RdEventStat);
00071 }
00072 
00082 static inline void ctk_event_ack(unsigned int event)
00083 {
00084     spu_writech(SPU_WrEventAck, event);
00085 }
00086 
00091 static inline unsigned int ctk_event_get_mask()
00092 {
00093     return spu_readch(SPU_RdEventMask);
00094 }
00095 
00102 static inline unsigned int ctk_event_set_mask(unsigned int new_mask)
00103 {
00104     unsigned int old, tmp = 0;
00105     old = spu_readch(SPU_RdEventMask);
00106     spu_writech(SPU_WrEventMask, tmp);
00107     if (spu_readchcnt(SPU_RdEventStat)) {
00108         tmp = spu_readch(SPU_RdEventStat);
00109         spu_writech(SPU_WrEventAck, tmp);
00110     }
00111     spu_writech(SPU_WrEventMask, new_mask);
00112     return old;
00113 }
00114 
00120 static inline int ctk_event_check_enabled()
00121 {
00122     unsigned int status = spu_readch(SPU_RdMachStat);
00123     return status & 0x1;
00124 }
00125 
00129 static inline void ctk_event_enable()
00130 {
00131     spu_ienable();
00132 }
00133 
00138 static inline unsigned int ctk_event_disable()
00139 {
00140     unsigned int status = spu_readch(SPU_RdMachStat);
00141     spu_idisable();
00142     return (status & 0x1);
00143 }
00144 
00145 #ifdef __cplusplus
00146 }
00147 #endif
